They're just as adorable as I imagined, i love these so much. Very comfortable and fit really nice. You can even take out the foam inside the shoe if your feet are more comfortable with a harder bottom. ❤️❤️❤️
Accurate size, very well made and the bottom support feels great

I bought these for my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves them. She normally wears a size 8 but I sized up to 8.5 and they fit her perfectly. The shoe quality so far is great, the style is super cute and comes with charms for her shoe laces.

They hurt my toes 8 1/2 feels like an 8 . & I wanted them because I hand sew teddybears. , but the shoes are a cute gift 4 my sister so I’m still happy. If they would’ve fit I would have rated them a four they are still cute.

Size up, the quality is awesome, people love them as much as I do!! I have to stand a lot for work and my feet don’t hurt as bad when I wear these. They are so so cute and make me feel like I have dainty feet. If you’re on the line about them, GET THEM

These shoes are SO comfy! They do run a little bit small, so make sure you size up! I bought one size up and they’re still a littttle tight. The pins come separate which is nice because you can decorate them yourself. They’re really padded on the inside so they feel really supportive.
